operation_signature.operation_name: aggregate - operation names can be identical but IP and Port of containers will differ

nodes.node_type: DataMapper or MLModel or DataBroker or TrainingClient or Splitter or Collator
nodes.image: url of the docker image of the named node in Nexus. Information consumed by deployer Aggregator-1
nodes.proto_uri: url of the proto file of the ML Model, otherwise empty

operation_signature.input_message_name: DataFrame - MC should send this message name to Probe along with proto_uri

nodes.node_type: DataMapper or MLModel or DataBroker or TrainingClient
nodes.image: url of the docker image of the named node Predictor-1
nodes.proto_uri: url of the proto file of the ML Model, otherwise empty

operation_signature.input_message_name: DataFrames  - MC should send this message name to Probe along with proto_uri

nodes.node_type: DataMapper or MLModel or DataBroker or TrainingClient
nodes.image: url of the docker image of the named node Classifier-1
nodes.proto_uri: url of the proto file of the ML Model, otherwise empty

operation_signature.input_message_name: Prediction  - MC should send this message name to Probe along with proto_uri

nodes.image: url of the docker image of the named node Alarm Generator-123
nodes.proto_uri: url of the proto file of the ML Model, otherwise empty

operation_signature.input_message_name: Classification  - This is last model. MC should send both input and output message name to Probe along with proto_uri
operation_signature.output_message_name: Alarm -  - This is last model. MC should send both input and output message name to Probe along with proto_uri

nodes.image: should be empty because this node type is no deployable - so no image is provided Splitter-1

operation_signature.input_message_name: name of message at Splitter input port - MC should NOT send this message name to Probe nor the proto_uri

splitter_map.splitter_type: Copy -based or Parameter-based - For Copy based splitting  map_inputs and map_outputs are not populated
splitter_map.input_message_signature: json representation of input message signature - required for parameter based splitting

input_field.parameter_name: parameter name in Source Protobuf file. A source may provide multiple parameters in its op signature for parameter based splitting
input_field.other_attributes: incomplete - will be populated for future parameter based splitting Sprint

output_field.target_name: name of model that consumes the message from the collator output port
output_field.other_attributes: incomplete - will be populated for future parameter based splitting Sprint

nodes.image: should be empty because this node type is not deployable - so no image is provided Collator-1

operation_signature.input_message_name: ANY - MC should NOT send this message name to Probe nor the proto_uri
operation_signature.output_message_name: name of the message at collator output port

collator_map.collator_type: Array-based or Parameter-based - For Array based collation map_inputs and map_outputs are not populated
collator_map.output_message_signature: json representation of output message signature - required for parameter based collation

input_field.source_name: name of model that provides message to collator input port
input_field.parameter_name: parameter name in Source Protobuf file. A source may provide multiple parameters for parameter based collation
input_field.parameter_type: name of parameter type aka message signature in Source Protobuf file
input_field.parameter_tag: parameter tag number in Source Protobuf file
input_field.mapped_to_field: tag number of the field in the target message side, empty if it is not yet mapped

output_field.parameter_tag: tag number of the field in the target message side
output_field.parameter_name: parameter name in Target Protobuf file
output_field.parameter_type: name of parameter type aka message signature in Target Protobuf file

nodes.image: empty - there is a well know url for each Data Broker type that is known to the Deployer My_CSV_File_Data_Broker
nodes.proto_uri: For a DataBroker type node, the Proto URI of the Protobuf File of the Model to which the DB output port is connected.MP - Portal will send this to Data Broker via /configDB

input_field.name: name of source field
input_field.type: string or int or float or boolean or Long or Double, Byte
input_field.mapped_to_field: tag number of the field in the target table, such as 1.2 or 2.3.4 or empty if it is not yet mapped

input_field.name: name of source field
input_field.mapped_to_field: tag number of the field in the target table, such as 1.2 or 2.3.4 or empty if it is not yet mapped

data_broker_map.script: user provided multi line SQL or File system commands to read, parse and retrieve data from file or directory
data_broker_map.target_system_url: File or JDBC url in the target system
data_broker_map.local_system_data_file_path: CSV or JSON Sample Data File path on users local machine
data_broker_map.first_row: contains_data or contains_field_names. this field is only populated for CSV file Data Broker

operation_signature.operation_name: pullData - the DB exposes this operation which is called by Model Connector
operation_signature.input_message_name: ANY  - MC should NOT send any input or output of DataBroker or Data Mapper to Probe
operation_signature.output_message_name: DataFrame - MC should NOT send any input or output of DataBroker or Data Mapper to Probe

training_clients.image: url of the training client image in Nexus
